title: rby
author: rby
content: I raised this topic because I saw that thread I created 2 months ago have been locked by a moderator ( cyrus or hilariousandco).This thread ⚽ Football Injuries and Injury Updates! is helpful to me for gambling decision making and I believe it is helpful to other gamblers who pleaded that I keep the thread alive because it's helpful to them.I want to know why the thread was locked so that I will not bother to create a similar thread in the future.I also want to know why that thread was locked and a thread like  this  is active. If there is no good reason, I request that the thread be unlocked. Thanks!

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: The description on the gambling discussion board may give a clue as to why your post is not needed there, and there have been so many complaints about unnecessary topics in the gambling discussion board not so long ago. Perhaps someone is trying to keep the board clean.Anyway, we move on

comments.author: Solosanz
comments.body: Injury isn't only a reason why the players will not play, I think the transfer speculation is already enough ⚽ Football Transfers Speculation, Odds and Predictions and could be included about injury discussion.If each reason need to create new thread, there's will be a lot spam topic created.1. Football injury update2. Football rumor update3. Football player's age update4. Football player's personal problem update5. Football player's promoting crypto casino update6. Football starting line up strategy update7. Football list substitution player updateetc.

comments.author: rby
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on January 11, 2023, 09:10:05 AMThe description on the gambling discussion board may give a clue as to why your post is not needed thereIf such topic doesn't fit in gambling discussion, where else in the forum can it fit?Quote and there have been so many complaints about unnecessary topics in the gambling discussion board not so long agoHow do you determine a necessary and unnecessary topics. Check the topic and what is discussed in it and tell me it's unnecessary. Is there any thread elsewhere discussing same thing?QuoteWhat is the meaning of the statement "Discussion of sports games and other gambling related services separate from games and services. I just want to know how the topic doesn't agree with the description.

comments.author: Oshosondy
comments.body: Quote from: rby on January 11, 2023, 09:21:54 AMIf such topic doesn't fit in gambling discussion, where else in the forum can it fit?If a player is having an injury and I see the impact of the player in matches played, I may decide not to go for that club in the next match to see how things turns out, which means the thread fits in gambling discussions, just as Mane did not play for Senegal in world cup in Qatar , but it can fit into ⚽ Football Transfers Speculation, Odds and Predictions which cover more areas including injury of players and transfer to speculate the next matches.

comments.author: PX-Z
comments.body: There are so many open discussion thread related to football on that board. If every sports discussion thread have its own sub-discussion thread for injuries, or whatever particular sub-topic it is, then that board will get more and more spam posts.

comments.author: hilariousandco
comments.body: I unlocked it and moved it to off topic. I think you're really reaching to try make that thread somewhat relatable to Gambling discussion but I don't blame you because that's what that board has become. At this point it probably should just be renamed Sports Discussion.

comments.author: CryptoPanda
comments.body: I agree with @JeromeTarash, the discussion isn’t enough to make a topic. I look at the thread and it was five pages long before it was locked. There was no need for such topic, most of the posts in the first 8 pages could have discussed in the World Cup threads. The remaining 2 pages were filled with discussion that clearly fits  Football Transfers Speculation, Odds and Predictions. All the World Cup threads have been locked and I don’t think the moderators were wrong to locked your thread. It was a good report in my opinion.
